message: Constant name not following naming convention - Name 'R_styleable_LinearLayout' must match pattern '^[A-Z][A-Z0-9]*(_[A-Z0-9]+)*$'.
Constant name not following naming convention - Name 'LinearLayout_divider' must match pattern '^[A-Z][A-Z0-9]*(_[A-Z0-9]+)*$'.
Constant name not following naming convention - Name 'LinearLayout_showDividers' must match pattern '^[A-Z][A-Z0-9]*(_[A-Z0-9]+)*$'.
Constant name not following naming convention - Name 'LinearLayout_dividerPadding' must match pattern '^[A-Z][A-Z0-9]*(_[A-Z0-9]+)*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mDivider' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mDividerWidth' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mDividerHeight' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mShowDividers' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mDividerPadding' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
